meanings.definition: A large, extinct mammal related to the sloth.
meanings.sent1: The megathere roamed the ancient forests slowly.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bones of the megathere to learn about its life.
meanings.sent3: The megathere tried to climb a tree but got stuck halfway up!
meanings.sent4: In size, the megathere was like a giant sloth from the past.
meanings.sent5: Children at the museum gasped at the enormous megathere skeleton.

meanings.definition: A genus of extinct ground sloths.
meanings.sent1: The megathere genus includes various species of ground sloths.
meanings.sent2: Fossils of the megathere genus are found in South America.
meanings.sent3: The megathere genus had a family reunion in the museum exhibit!
meanings.sent4: In the past, the megathere genus roamed the grasslands freely.
meanings.sent5: The megathere genus was like a community of ancient sloths.

meanings.sent1: The megathere was a huge mammal that lived long ago.
meanings.sent2: People marveled at the size of the megathere fossil in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The megathere tried to hide behind a tiny bush, but it didn't work!
meanings.sent4: Legends spoke of the megathere as a colossal creature of the past.
meanings.sent5: The megathere's footprints in the mud were as big as dinner plates.
